alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wayne County through 900 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Downtown Detroit, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Downtown Detroit around 820 PM EDT. Belle Isle around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hamtramck, River Rouge, Southwest Detroit and Highland Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
